layout.name: type
layout.title: Type
layout.tooltip: Which subvariation should it use? Check the behavior section in the NPC's tooltip for more info.

layout.name: inv
layout.title: Inventory
layout.tooltip: What inventory ID should the dropper begin with? After spawning an NPC this gets set to 0. Use hoppers to refill the dropper.

layout.name: autofire
layout.title: Autofire
layout.tooltip: If checked, the dropper will instantly spawn the NPC without waiting for redstone power

layout.name: overwrite
layout.title: Overwrite Mode
layout.tooltip: Normally, the dropper will only accept an inventory ID if its inventory slot is 0. If this is checked, hoppers will always override the inventory slot
